ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Validity rating
Respondent Source
Notes: 1= subject; 2= parent; 3= clinician; 4= teacher; 5= trainer; 6= fidelity reviewer

ElementDescription: Gets lost in own thoughts
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Easily tired or fatigued
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Forgets what was going to say
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Easily confused
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Lacks motivation to complete tasks (e.g., apathetic)
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Spaces or zones out
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Gets mixed up
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Thinking is slow
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Difficulty expressing thoughts (e.g., gets tongue-tied)
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Does the presence of these 16 behaviors CURRENTLY cause academic difficulties for your son or daughter?
Notes: 0=No Difficulty ; 1=Slight Difficulty ; 2=Moderate Difficulty ; 3=Severe Difficulty

ElementDescription: Does the presence of these 16 behaviors CURRENTLY cause social difficulties (e.g., difficulties in interactions with parents, siblings, peers, other adults at community activities) for your son or daughter?
Notes: 0=No Difficulty ; 1=Slight Difficulty ; 2=Moderate Difficulty ; 3=Severe Difficulty

ElementDescription: Behavior is slow (sluggish)
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Lost in a fog
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Stares blankly into space
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Drowsy or sleepy (yawns) during the day
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Daydreams
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Loses train of thought
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Low level of activity (e.g., underactive)
Notes: 0=Almost Never (Never or about once per month) ; 1=Seldom (about once per week) ; 2=Sometimes (several times per week) ; 3=Often(about once per day) ; 4=Very often (several times per day) ; 5=Almost always (many times per day)

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, Morning, At Bedtime
